page.title: 15Education
page.content: There are 3 schools in the block but children from within the block also atend the two Pilling schools. THE PRIMARY SCHOOLS Preesall Carter's Charity School,founded by the will of Robt Carter in 1710,serves the Knott-End area and the north of Preesall with about 200 pupils.Preesall Fleetwood's Charity School has about 100 pupils drawn from the south of the area.In Pilling there are two denominational schools St William's R.C. Primary and St John's C.E.Primary. SECONDARY SCHOOL St Aidan's C.E.High School was founded in 1962 as a 188 pupil Secondary Modern to serve Over-Wyre and is now a 700+ pupil 11-16 Comprehensive.The name is particularly suitable as Aidan was Oswald's Bishop (St Oswald's is the parish church of Preesall).
